resources.string: Touch any place will return edit page
Every day receive new wallpapers, requires data connection, do you want to continue?
"Don't cover the top of the phone"
Input SIM PUK and new PIN code
SIM card is missing or not readable. Please insert a SIM card.
"Your SIM card has been permanently blocked. Contact your service provider for assistance."
SIM is now disabled. Input PUK code to continue. Contact carrier for details.
Input PIN that is 4 to 8 numbers.
PUK code should be 8 numbers or more.
Input the correct PUK code again. Repeated attempts will permanently disable the SIM.
To unlock, sign in with your Google account.

"You have incorrectly typed your PIN %d times.
Try again in %d seconds."

"You have incorrectly typed your password %d times.
Try again in %d seconds."

"You have incorrectly drawn your unlock pattern %d times.
Try again in %d seconds."
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %d times. After %d more unsuccessful attempts, the phone will be reset to factory default and all user data will be lost.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %d times. The phone will now be reset to factory default.

"You have incorrectly drawn your unlock pattern %d times. After %d more unsuccessful attempts, you will be asked to unlock your phone using an email account.
Try again in %d seconds."
Incorrect SIM PIN code you must now contact your carrier to unlock your device.
SIM is unusable. Contact your carrier.
You inputted the wrong information 5 times in a row
"Please contact your operator to unlock your device. "
The SIM card has been locked. Enter PUK code to unlock
Input fingerprint or password to unlock
Unable to recognize fingerprint. Please enter your password
Input fingerprint or draw the unlock pattern to unlock
Unable to recognize the fingerprint. Please draw the unlock pattern
Fingerprint tried 5 times when screen is off
Fingerprint data corrupted. Please enter password
Fingerprint data corrupted. Please draw the unlock pattern
Unlock the SIM card before using the fingerprint
Saving, please wait before making a new screenshot.
No network connection,please try again later.
Turn off the application using the camera and try again.
Long press to re order icons
Also can be shown in Launcher if inactive
Slide up from the bottom of the screen to open quick toggles panel
"Show today's schedule content by double tapping"
"Show today's scheduled notificated in drop down"
Location failure, please check internet connection and try again
Are you sure you want to add this City?
Are you sure you want to activate airplane mode?
Battery temperature is too high. Phone will shutdown
Turn on data connection, mobile phone will use GPRS/3G/4G data. Consult your operator for charges. Do you want to continue?
"Increase volume above recommended level? Listening at high volume for long periods may damage your hearing."
"USB charging not supported. Charging can only be done with the charger provided with this product. "
"Use only the charger provided with this product for charging. "
Allow app %1$s to access this USB device?
Allow app %1$s to access the USB accessory?
Open %1$s when this USB device is connected?
Open %1$s when this USB accessory is connected?
No installed apps work with this USB accessory. Learn more about this accessory at %1$s
Used for this USB device by default
Used for this USB accessory by default
"Unable to take screenshot. There could be insufficient storage space, or this operation is not permitted by the app/your unit. "
Install Android File Transfer app for Mac

"Your device turned off data because it reached the set data usage limit you set.
Turning it back on may lead to charges from your carrier."
Screen is locked in landscape orientation.
Screen is locked in portrait orientation.
Screen is now locked in landscape orientation.
Screen is now locked in portrait orientation.
All apps and data in this session will be deleted.
Do you want to continue your session?

"When you add a new user, that person needs to set up their space.
Any user can update apps for all other users."
"%s will start capturing everything that's displayed on your screen."
Can not switch to this task, because it has no interface.
You should keep at lease one home activity!

"This device is managed by: %1$s
Your administrator can monitor your device and network activity, including emails, apps and secure websites.
For more information, contact your administrator."

"You gave \"%1$s\" permission to set up a VPN connection.
This app can monitor your device and network activity, including emails, apps and secure websites."

"You're connected to a VPN (\"%1$s\").
Your VPN service provider can monitor your device and network activity including emails, apps, and secure websites."

"This device is managed by: %1$s
Your administrator is capable of monitoring your network activity including emails, apps, and secure websites. For more information, contact your administrator.
Also, you gave \"%2$s\" permission to set up a VPN connection. This app can monitor network activity too."

"This device is managed by: %1$s

Also, you're connected to a VPN (\"%2$s\"). Your VPN service provider can monitor network activity too."

For more information, contact your administrator."

For more information, contact your administrator."

"This profile is managed by: %1$s

Also, you're connected to a VPN (\"%3$s\"). Your VPN service provider can monitor network activity too."
Device will stay locked until you manually unlock
View notifications without unlocking the device
"%1$s M of memory released successfully %2$s M of memory available"
Calling, click to return to call
Torch is on. Tap to turn off torch
This phone is lost or stolen, please return me.
Can not access files, click for details
Please install file manager in application center to access files
Keep in view until unpinned. Touch and hold Power and volume up at the same time to unpin.
Keep in view until unpinned. Touch and hold overview to unpin.
%1$s is the current output volume device
Touch to restore the original device.
